main event: A sentry officer reported seeing a bright light in the sky that was moving at more than twice the speed of a jet fighter.
interesting points: The object was described as oval-shaped with a greenish tinge, and very large in size.
The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes.
The sentry officer stated that the object was definitely a strange, unidentified object and did not resemble any existing type of aircraft.
The sighting was reported to a flight service, and a fighter was sent to investigate but could not locate the object.
The sighting occurred at around 11:30 pm near the town of McComb, Ohio.
sighted object: oval-shaped light with a greenish tinge
